values.name: matrix
values.comment:
Get a Bayer matrix with a width and height of 2^size.

    import Array2D

    matrix 1
    --> Array2D.fromList
    --> [ [ 0, 2 ]
    --> , [ 3, 1 ]
    --> ]

    matrix 2
    --> Array2D.fromList
    --> [ [ 0, 8, 2, 10 ]
    --> , [ 12, 4, 14, 6 ]
    --> , [ 3, 11, 1, 9 ]
    --> , [ 15, 7, 13, 5 ]
    --> ]

values.name: matrixNormalized
values.comment:
Same as matrix but the values are normalized between 0 and 1.

    import Array2D

    matrixNormalized 1
    --> Array2D.fromList
    --> [ [ 0, 2 / 4 ]
    --> , [ 3 / 4, 1 / 4 ]
    --> ]

    matrixNormalized 2
    --> Array2D.fromList
    --> [ [ 0, 8 / 16, 2 / 16, 10 / 16 ]
    --> , [ 12 / 16, 4 / 16, 14 / 16, 6 / 16 ]
    --> , [ 3 / 16, 11 / 16, 1 / 16, 9 / 16 ]
    --> , [ 15 / 16, 7 / 16, 13 / 16, 5 / 16 ]
    --> ]
